Description.LocalizedString:
An original copy of the first issue of Adi Valente, the comic her father made while Adriana was a child.
  • Survivors with a Claw Trap suffer from 20% smaller skill checks. This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.

A sudden and overwhelming light that discombobulates anyone foolish enough to approach.
  • Survivors with a Claw Trap suffer from the Blindness status effect. This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.
    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

The drones generate and communicate a detailed three-dimensional map of the terrain, making traversal easier.
  • Gain a 20% action speed bonus to breaking pallets and breakable walls, damaging generators, and vaulting for 8 seconds after deploying a Drone.

A wider cable with low resistance that allows faster recharging of batteries.
  • Increases the time Survivors appear on the radar when detected by 1 second.

The drone takes account of the surrounding area and casts lights in a bewildering manner that obscures movement.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable status effect by 20%.
    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

An upgrade that allows increased three-dimensional audio tracking.

  • Decreases the Disabled state duration of Drones by 15%.

The batteries may run a little hot, but removing the safety protocols from the cells makes them last a little longer.
  • Increases the battery life of Claw Traps by 15%.

Capable of directing high-frequency noises in a single direction over great distances, the drones can focus in on one individual and distract them from danger for some time.
  • Survivors with a Claw Trap have no skill check warning. This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.

By intermittently powering off and on non-vital components, the drone can stay on for longer.
  • Decreases Drone Rotation speed by 100%.

Once used on the strings used for battle kites, this powdered glass took on a much more nefarious purpose on her blade.

  • Claw Trapped Survivors you hit suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for 70 seconds.

    • Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.
    Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

An additional process in the drone’s programming more accurately predicts the weaknesses of potential prey.
  • Increases the Hindered status effect gained by Claw Trapped Survivors when detected by a Drone by 3%.
    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

An ominous hum disseminates from the drone, blanketing the soundscape and making it difficult to hear anything else.
  • Survivors with a Claw Trap suffer from the Oblivious status effect. This lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.
    • Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

A bone-chilling rattling emanates from the drone, and it seems like it make fall at any minute, distracting Survivors from complicated tasks.
  • Survivors with a Claw Trap suffer from the Exhausted status effect for 6 seconds.
    • Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Heat-detecting cameras focus in on high-stress individuals with pinpoint accuracy.
  • Anytime a Claw Trap is removed, the Survivor's aura is revealed for 4 seconds.

Lights flash randomly on the ground, making it harder to find purchase on the uneven terrain.
  • Increases the duration of the Hindered status effect Claw Trapped Survivors suffer from when detected by a Drone by 1 second.

    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Even after they leave the zone of influence, a refined AI program predicts with high accuracy where a person will go next.
  • When a Survivor receives a Claw Trap, reveal their aura for 6 seconds.

A high-frequency noise blaster that fills the sonic spectrum with disorienting sounds, making it impossible for observers to pick out more important noises.
  • Decreases Survivors' scan line immunity duration by 25%.

The batteries on these Claw Traps have been swapped out with old alkaline batteries. Recharging is not recommended.
  • Decreases Claw Trap battery life by 50%. Increases the Haste status effect gained from Survivors being detected on the Radar by 25%.

    • Haste increases Killer movement speed.

The cutting-edge design allows the drone to move with razor-sharp precision.
  • Increases Drones' rotation speed by 10%.

Before he disappeared, Adriana’s father had started a newer, darker manga, Sonhadores Sombrios.
  • When a Drone is disabled, it gains a 32-meter Terror Radius for 15 seconds. During this time, gain the Undetectable status effect.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.
    “When evil is on the loose, it cannot escape from Adi Valente!” – Quote on the cover of Adi Valente #1
